original_text: To hear the groaning of the prisoner; to loose those that are appointed to death;
korean_text: 이는 갇힌 자의 탄식을 들으시며 죽이기로 정한 자를 해방하사

sentences.original_text: To hear the groaning of the prisoner
sentences.korean_translation: 감옥에 갇힌 자의 신음 소리를 들으시며

sentences.original_text: to loose those that are appointed to death
